original_text:
this also would be an iniquity to be punished by the judges,
    for I would have been false to God above.
korean_text: 그것도 재판에 회부할 죄악이니 내가 그리하였으면 위에 계신 하나님을 속이는 것이리라

sentences.original_text: this also would be an iniquity to be punished by the judges
sentences.korean_translation: 이것 또한 재판관들에게 벌을 받을 죄가 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: for I would have been false to God above.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 내가 높으신 하나님께 거짓되었을 것이기 때문입니다.
